name: kvissleik
description: Quiz web-app with a single host and multiple clients, using WebRTC
info: Quiz web-app with a single host and multiple clients, using WebRTC, inspired by the Jackbox game series. Room-hosting is done through a dedicated signalling server (samspill), with alternative signalling systems on the roadmap. The minimal quiz-editor should not be considered part of the SolidHack submission, as its origins date back to the initial commit before the contest start
